post:
Dear LET members,

It's no news that I and Jarland joined forces, and now work together in both MXroute.com / MXroute.io, but, enough story, let's go to the offers, shall we ladies/gentlemen? ;-)

![](https://mxroute.io/images/logo.png)

**MXroute.io - SMTP Relay Service, by MailChannels**

So, offers available for **72 hours**, or while stock lasts.

**LET 10k**

**10k emails per month**

SMTP Relay Access 

MailChannels Cloud Access

5€ per month or 50€ per year - [Signup here](https://mxroute.io/LET.html#plans)

----------------------------------

**LET 5k**

**5k emails per month**

SMTP Relay Access

MailChannels Cloud Access

35€ per year - [Signup here](https://mxroute.io/LET.html#plans)

----------------------------------

**LET 2k**

**2k emails per month**

SMTP Relay Access

MailChannels Cloud Access

25€ per year - [Signup here](https://mxroute.io/LET.html#plans)


Benefits signing up for our plans

- MailChannels integration in WHMCS (including overages, full automation);

- 2FA available in WHMCS (secure your account properly);

- Support by us and MailChannels - as you're a Cloud user, you're entitled for their 24x7 Support as well;

- Plugins available for cPanel/DirectAdmin;

- Awesome email delivery by MailChannels;

_*Listed prices do not include VAT - EU residents are subject to VAT as per the MOSS Agreement (companies with a valid VAT number are VAT exempt where individuals without a valid VAT number are charged the country's VAT rate)._

_*Post approved by @ElliotJ_

Enjoy!
